summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust from February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and interest payments, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer of $150,000 to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $150,000 was made from the Butterfly Trust account to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $158 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust account had a beginning balance of $357,419.85 on February 1, 2019.
The account experienced a significant outgoing transfer of $150,000 on February 5, 2019.
The ending balance of the account as of February 28, 2019, was $207,577.85.
An interest payment of $158 was credited to the account on February 28, 2019.
The document contains instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
